document_title: Delayed menstruation (late menstruation): Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_content: Delayed menstruation (or delayed menstruation) is an abnormal menstrual phenomenon in women, referring to the situation in which menstruation has arrived but menstruation has not yet appeared. Normally, if more than 35 days have passed since the last menstrual period and a woman still has not had her period again, it is considered a late period. Cases where menstruation does not appear for 3 consecutive menstrual periods without pregnancy are called amenorrhea. (first)
subsection_title: cham kinh.json. What is delayed menstruation?
subsection_data:
cham kinh.json. What is delayed menstruation?
Delayed menstruation (or delayed menstruation) is an abnormal menstrual phenomenon in women, referring to the situation in which menstruation has arrived but menstruation has not yet appeared. Normally, if more than 35 days have passed since the last menstrual period and a woman still has not had her period again, it is considered a late period. Cases where menstruation does not appear for 3 consecutive menstrual periods without pregnancy are called amenorrhea. (first)
